name: Enjo
description:
Enjo is

A single player story driven game, where you (Enjo) ; a young warrior set off on an unexpected journey to defeat the shade Klan and emperor Shiro.

Created by Jasmine O'Hagan, Jess Roughton, Gwydion Meredydd

*Disclaimer This Game was created for educational Purposes Only! Some third party assets were used and are listed on the document below. The Game does not mean to infringe or profit from these respected properties, only to use them for the University assignment.*
